content: The following are the records of [Singapore](/wiki/Singapore) in [Olympic weightlifting](/wiki/Olympic_weightlifting). Records are maintained in each [weight class](/wiki/Weight_class) for the [snatch](/wiki/Snatch_(weightlifting)) lift, [clean and jerk](/wiki/Clean_and_jerk) lift, and the total for both lifts by the
